word_mean: 假牙整列的：在牙科学上制假牙时调整或置各牙于其彼此间适当关系的位置上

sentence.Network_cn: 他文雅、迷人、能言善辩，是一名优秀的谈判人。

sentence.Network_en: She is an articulate young woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是一个口才很好的年轻女子。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin articulatus, past participle of articulare 'divide into joints, utter distinctly', from articulus 'small connecting part' (see article)

entry.tran: 善于表达的;口齿伶俐的
entry.def: If you describe someone as articulate, you mean that they are able to express their thoughts and ideas easily and well.

example.ex: She is an articulate young woman...
example.tran: 她是一个口才很好的年轻女子。

example.ex: The child was unable to offer an articulate description of what she had witnessed.
example.tran: 孩子无法对她所目睹的事情作出清楚的描述。

entry.tran: 清楚地表达（思想或感情）
entry.def: When you articulate your ideas or feelings, you express them clearly in words.

example.ex: The president has been accused of failing to articulate an overall vision in foreign affairs.
example.tran: 总统因未能清晰表述对外交事务的整体构想而受到指责。

entry.def: If you articulate something, you say it very clearly, so that each word or syllable can be heard.

example.tran: 他小心而清晰地发出每个音节。

sentences.sentence: "the carpenter jointed two pieces of wood"

means.word_mean: 2. put into words or an expression;

sentences.sentence: "He formulated his concerns to the board of trustees"

means.word_mean: 3. speak, pronounce, or utter in a certain way;

sentences.sentence: "She pronounces French words in a funny way"
"Can the child sound out this complicated word?"

means.word_mean: 1. expressing yourself easily or characterized by clear expressive language;
2. consisting of segments held together by joints

auth_sentence.content: Smart and articulate, he is also a realist.
auth_sentence.res_content: Smart and articulate, he is also a realist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Smart and articulate, he is also a realist.

auth_sentence.content: A pretty, personable, and articulate 28-year-old girl.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A pretty, personable, and articulate 28-year-old girl.

auth_sentence.content: He hates Westerners but he cannot articulate why.
auth_sentence.res_content: He hates Westerners but he cannot articulate why.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He hates Westerners but he cannot articulate why.

stems_affixes.type_exp: =skill, joint, trick, 表示"技巧,关节,诡计"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 善于表达的;有关节相连的
stems_affixes.word_buile: artic关节+ulate表动词→关节咬住,引申为说话清楚
artic关节+ulate表动词→关节咬住,引申为说话清楚

sentences.cn: 清楚的表达能力是非常重要的。

means.word_mean: 口齿清楚的, 发音清晰的

sentences.en: That man is not very articulate.

jushi.english: His gave a witty, entertaining and articulate speech.
jushi.chinese: 他口齿伶俐，演讲得妙趣横生、娓娓动听。

jushi.english: Articulate speech is very important for a teacher.
jushi.chinese: 清楚的表达能力对于一个教师来说是非常重要的。

jushi.english: At the age of 89, he was still sharp-witted and articulate.
jushi.chinese: 虽是89岁高龄，他依然思维敏捷、口齿清楚。
